text:
Jaemin selesai menyajikan teh dan beberapa cemilan untuk ayahnya dan Jeno.
Jaemin sendiri sebenarnya bingung kenapa ia ada disana. Sedikit kaget ketika Yena menginterupsi sesi sedihnya dengan panggilan raja keruang istirahat pemimpin kerajaan itu, tapi disanalah Jaemin berakhir.
Menyajikan teh untuk 2 orang yang membicarakan sesuatu yang tak Jaemin mengerti.
Jadi setelah menjalankan perintah, Jaemin menunduk sebelum bersiap meninggalkan ruangan.
"Jaemin,." tapi Raja memanggilnya.
Jaemin menghentikan langkahnya "Yah, yang mulia." Jawab Jaemin.
"Duduklah disamping Jeno."
Dan Jaemin menurut.
Raja menatap Jaemin dan Jeno bergantian.
"saya yakin kalian sudah mengenal satu sama lain." Raja berhenti sebentar, menyesap tehnya sebelum kembali melanjutkan.
"pangeran Jeno, bagaimana Jaemin menurutmu?"
Jeno berdehem sebentar, menatap Jaemin yang membulatkan matanya bingung pada Jeno, tampak bodoh sekali.
trans:
Jaemin had finished serving tea and some snacks to Jeno and his father.
Jaemin was confused herself why she was there. She was a bit surprised when Yena interrupted her sad session with the king's call to the kingdom leader's rest room, but there was where Jaemin ended.
Serving tea for 2 people who were talking about something that Jaemin did not understand.
So, after completing the order, Jaemin lowered her head before getting ready to leave the room.
"Jaemin,." but the King called her.
Jaemin stopped her steps "Yes, Your Highness." Answered Jaemin.
"Sit next to Jeno."
And Jaemin obeyed.
The King stared at Jaemin and Jeno in turn.
"I am sure that you have known each other." The King stopped for a while, sipping his tea before continuing.
"Prince Jeno, what do you think about Jaemin?"
Jeno clear his throat for a while, staring at Jaemin who rounded her confused eyes at Jeno, looked very stupid.
